Headline: #91 Austin Temporary Southbound Reroute near Austin/Garfield
ShortDescription: SB 91 Austin buses temp. rerouted via Austin, Garfield Street, Lombard, Fillmore, Harvey, Roosevelt, and Austin: due to, construction near Austin/Garfield.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound  #91 Austin buses are temporarily rerouted via Austin, Garfield Street, Lombard, Fillmore, Harvey, Roosevelt, and Austin, due to street blockage near Austin/Garfield.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Howard-bound Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: Howard-bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity at Grand. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity at Grand.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
